fallBackText.description: Default fallback text for dynamic attributes

fallBackDisabledCharacters.description: Characters not allowed in fallback text

valueFormat.structure: Array with start and end delimiter

countDynamicContentForValidation.description: Include dynamic content in character count

exampleEnrichments.title: Basic Rich Text with Dynamic Content
exampleEnrichments.code:
<InSuperInput
  id="message"
  label="Message"
  placeholder-text="Enter your message..."
  v-model="messageContent"
  dynamic-content-support
  :attribute-list="[
    { label: 'First Name', value: 'first_name' },
    { label: 'Last Name', value: 'last_name' },
    { label: 'Email', value: 'email' }
  ]"
  is-counter
  :text-validate-config="{ maxLength: 500 }"
  @purify="handlePurify"
/>

exampleEnrichments.title: SMS Input with Fallbacks
exampleEnrichments.description: SMS message with dynamic content and fallbacks
exampleEnrichments.code:
<InSuperInput
  id="sms"
  label="SMS Message"
  sms-text="SMS"
  v-model="smsContent"
  dynamic-content-support
  :attribute-list="attributes"
  :delimiters="['{{', '}}']"
  fall-back-label="Default Value"
  fall-back-placeholder="Enter default..."
  is-counter
  :text-validate-config="{ maxLength: 160 }"
  count-dynamic-content-for-validation
/>

  v-model="tagContent"
  is-tag-container
  :tags-limit="10"
  :attribute-list="tagOptions"
  create-new-option-status
  create-new-option-text="Add new tag"
  disable-duplicate-tags
/>
